text: The Passion of Joan of Arc () is a 1928 French drama movie directed by Carl Theodor Dreyer and starring Renée Jeanne Falconetti, Eugène Silvain, André Berley, Maurice Schutz, Antonin Artaud. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1928 drama movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:French drama movies Category:French silent movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Theodor Dreyer Category:Movies set in the 15th century
title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
